detaileddescription.para: Translate string to current locale using Qt.

detaileddescription.para: ConnectAndCallRPC wraps CallRPC with -rpcwait and an exception handler.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to const string method to forward to CallRPC.
Reference to const optional string wallet name to forward to CallRPC.

simplesect.para: the RPC response as a UniValue object.

parameterdescription.para: CConnectionFailed std::runtime_error if connection failed or RPC server still in warmup.

detaileddescription.para: Parse UniValue result to update the message to print to std::cout.
Parse UniValue error to update the message to print to std::cerr and the code to return.
GetWalletBalances calls listwallets; if more than one wallet is loaded, it then fetches mine.trusted balances for each loaded wallet and pushes them to result.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to UniValue object the wallet names and balances are pushed to.

detaileddescription.para: GetProgressBar constructs a progress bar with 5% intervals.

parameterdescription.para: The proportion of the progress bar to be filled between 0 and 1.
String representation of the progress bar.

detaileddescription.para:
ParseGetInfoResult takes in -getinfo result in UniValue object and parses it into a user friendly UniValue string to be printed on the console.
result
Reference to UniValue result containing the -getinfo output.

Call RPC getnewaddress.
getnewaddress response as a UniValue object.

Check bounds and set up args for RPC generatetoaddress params: nblocks, address, maxtries.
address
Reference to const string address to insert into the args.
args
Reference to vector of string args to modify.
Join all container items. Typically used to concatenate strings but accepts containers with elements of any type.

parameterdescription.para: Apply this operator to each item
